Front brakes: Double disc. Big single piston calipers
Rear brakes: Single disc. Big single piston caliper  same brake shoes as the front
Frame type: Tubelar double cradle with reinforced backbone
Color options: Black frame and white fairing and tank with optional black center section. Full crash bars front and rear with side cases and radio box mounted behind rider.
Seat height: 805 mm (31.7 inches) If adjustable, lowest setting.
Front suspension: Telescopic air assisted spring  and oil damped
Comments: Kz1000p police version, fitted with a heavy fibreglass fairing and wind-shield that allows a sitting up position at all speeds.Dunlop run flat tires. No pillion seat but a radio box and side panniers as standard.Siren, and red/blue lights mounted in the fairing, modified controls on the handlebars for the lights and siren.
Alternate seat height: 805 mm (31.7 inches) If adjustable, highest setting.
Carrying capacity: 200 kg two riders (2nd seat fitted) or in side cases aprox 10 liter each max weight 550kgs.
